compliance.headline: Client Confidentiality Guaranteed

compliance.confidentiality: We understand client confidentiality requirements. All documents are encrypted, access is controlled, and we never use your client data for AI training.

faq.question: Is client data secure and confidential?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We're SOC 2 Type II certified with enterprise-grade encryption. All client documents are encrypted at rest and in transit. We never share data or use it for AI training. Perfect for NDAs.

faq.question: Can our whole consulting team collaborate?
faq.answer: Yes! The Team plan ($49/mo) allows unlimited users to share and organize summarized research. Build a firm-wide knowledge base of industry reports and competitive intelligence.

faq.question: What types of documents can you summarize?
faq.answer: All consulting materials: client annual reports, strategy presentations, market research, competitive analysis, RFPs, industry studies, and more. If it's a PDF, we can summarize it.

faq.question: How accurate are the summaries for strategic work?
faq.answer: Our AI is trained on business and strategy documents. It excels at extracting key findings, metrics, and insights. However, always apply your consulting judgment and verify critical details.

faq.question: What plan is best for consulting teams?
faq.answer: Most boutique firms use the Team plan ($49/mo) for unlimited users and shared libraries. Large consulting firms should consider our Enterprise plan with advanced security and SSO. Contact sales.

faq.question: Can we export summaries for client deliverables?
faq.answer: Yes! Export as PDF, Word, or plain text. Include your firm's branding and incorporate summaries into client presentations and reports.
